value:
$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Ugh! Ptah! This wind is brutal—I just
got a whole mouthful of sand...$k$p$WmMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|The Wind Tribe uses sandstorms
like this to help defend Reppu Castle.$k$p$nMPID_オロチ|Uncomfortable as it may be for the
uninitiated, there's no use in
complaining about it.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|I think the Wind Tribe's breeze is
just invigorating. I'd love to glide
over their village on it...$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|That settles it, Catria. We're getting
a kite!$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|Huh? Ah—wait for me, Princess Dagr!$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_13_Kagerou_FF_Pair,Face|Hah... Such noisy guests they are.$k$pStill, Lady Mikoto would be pleased
to see the customs of Hoshido being
celebrated in another world.$k$p$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Agreed. She always did have a special
fondness for festivals of this kind.$k$p$nMPID_オロチ|She liked seeing people happy. It's
what made her such a good queen.$k$p$nMPID_比翼カゲロウ_v7.9|Let's get ahold of our nostalgia.
We still have a lot to do here.$k$p$nMPID_オロチ|You're right, of course.$k$pEven so, I can't help but think how
sad it is that she won't ever get to
experience all this energy and joy...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|$Fi1500|I was all set to sneak up on Orochi
and pop this pinwheel in her hair,
but maybe I should hold off.$k$pThey look like they've having a kinda
serious conversation.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|Mikoto was the queen of Hoshido,
I think. I seem to remember hearing
that she had passed on.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Ah... Yeah, sounds like they've had it
tough in the past.$k$pI hope we can get their spirits back
up. They deserve to have as good a
time at the festival as everyone else...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_風部族クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Wind01,Face|Hey, there's my pinwheel! I've been
looking all over for that thing.$k$pGuess you're the one who had it,
then. Mind giving it back?$k$p$WmMPID_風部族ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Wind01,Face|Oh, was this yours? Yeah, I found it
on the ground just over there.$k$pHere you go, little guy. All yours.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Wind01,Face|Thanks. Say, could you lower it just
a teensy bit more, so this little guy
can reach?$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|Please just hand it back to him
normally, Princess Dagr! You're
going to offend him...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|I'm so sorry about that, Claude.
Princess Dagr is a little too...playful
at times.$k$p$WmMPID_風部族クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Wind01,Face|Oh, it's fine. I didn't take any offense.
Just like you'll be fine with it when
I crush you in the tournament, right?$k$p$WmMPID_風部族カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Wind01,Face|I...honestly can't tell if he's angry
or not...$k$p$Sbs150|
